00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <utility>
00012 
00020 namespace hope {
00021     namespace detail {
00022 
00029         template <typename TStruct, std::size_t I>
00030         struct any_convertible {
00031             template <typename T, typename = std::enable_if_t<!std::is_base_of_v<T, TStruct>>>
00032             constexpr operator T& () const noexcept;
00033         };
00034 
00043         template <typename TStruct, std::size_t... Is>
00044         constexpr auto is_constructable_n(std::index_sequence<Is...>)
00045             ->decltype(TStruct{ any_convertible<TStruct, Is>{}... }, bool()) {
00046             return true;
00047         }
00048         template <typename TStruct, std::size_t... Is>
00049         constexpr auto is_constructable_n(...) {
00050             return false;
00051         }
00052 
00060         template <typename TStructure, std::size_t... Is>
00061         constexpr std::size_t detect_fields_count_impl(std::index_sequence<Is...> sequence) {
00062             bool bs[] = { is_constructable_n<TStructure>(std::make_index_sequence<Is>())... };
00063             // since cxx20... msvc sucks
00064             //return std::distance(std::begin(bs), std::find(
00065             //    std::begin(bs), std::end(bs), false)
00066             //);
00067 
00068             for (std::size_t i{ 1 }; i < sequence.size(); ++i) {
00069                 if (!bs[i]) return i - 1;
00070             }
00071             return 0;
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00080     template <typename TStructure>
00081     constexpr std::size_t detect_fields_count() {
00082         static_assert(!std::is_polymorphic_v<TStructure>, "---- hope ---- Polymorphic types are not allowed");
00083         static_assert(std::is_aggregate_v<TStructure>, "---- hope ---- Only aggregate initializable types are allowed");
00084 
00085         constexpr auto size = sizeof(TStructure);
00086         return detail::detect_fields_count_impl<TStructure>(std::make_index_sequence<size + 2>());
00087     }
00088 }
